bookingCommon.bookingProtected: Your booking is protected by { by }

payments.title: Payments
payments.paragraph1: If you are purchasing your ticket using a debit or credit card via the Website, we will process these payments via the automated secure common payment gateway which will be subject to fraud screening purposes.
payments.paragraph2: If you do not supply the correct card billing address and/or cardholder information, your booking will not be confirmed and the overall cost may increase. We reserve the right to cancel your booking if payment is declined for any reason or if you have supplied incorrect card information. If we become aware of, or is notified of, any fraud or illegal activity associated with the payment for the booking, the booking will be cancelled and you will be liable for all costs and expenses arising from such cancellation, without prejudice to any action that may be taken against us.
payments.paragraph3: {companyName} may require the card holder to provide additional payment verification upon request by either submitting an online form or visiting the nearest {companyName} office, or at the airport at the time of check-in. {companyName} reserves the right to deny boarding or to collect a guarantee payment (in cash or from another credit card) if the card originally used for the purchase cannot be presented by the cardholder at check-in or when collecting the tickets, or in the case the original payment has been withheld or disputed by the card issuing bank. Credit card details are held in a secured environment and transferred through an internationally accepted system.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.directions: If you have any questions about our Website or our Terms of Use, please use contact details you can found at {siteUrl}

loginPage.title: Login
loginPage.subTitle: Login to access your Golobe account
loginPage.invalidCredentials: Login with provided email and password has failed

signUpPage.title: Sign Up
signUpPage.subTitle: Let’s get you all set up so you can access your personal account.
signUpPage.emailWasAutoverified: DEVELOPMENT ONLY: Provided email has been autoverified by the system and now you can login using your credentials. You could also enable emailing in server config to use actual emails for verification in signup flow

signUpVerifyPage.title: Complete Your Sign Up
signUpVerifyPage.text: An email has been sent to you. Please, check your inbox and follow confirmation link in the email to complete your registration process. The link will be valid for { tokenExpirationHours } hours

text.success: Congratulations! Sign up process has been successfully completed and now you can login with provided credentials.
text.alreadyConsumed: The link has already been used for email confirmation. You should be able to login using the email.
text.linkInvalid: The link is invalid or broken. Please, check it for correctness. You may also try to register again using different email or contact support to assist you on the problem.
text.linkExpired: The link has expired. Please, start sign up process again to obtain a new one.

text.success: Congratulations! Your email has been successfully verified and now you can login using the email.
text.alreadyConsumed: The link has already been used for email confirmation. You should be able to login using the email.
text.linkInvalid: The link is invalid or broken. Please, check it for correctness. You may also again try to update email information on user's account page to obtain a new link.
text.linkExpired: The link has expired. Please, update email information on user's account page again to obtain a new link.

forgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPasswordPage.subTitle: Don’t worry, happens to all of us. Enter your email below to recover your password
forgotPasswordPage.userNotFound: User with specified email is not registered in system
forgotPasswordPage.emailNotVerified: User email has not been verified. Please, check your inbox for confirmation link

forgotPasswordVerifyPage.title: Password reset confirmation
forgotPasswordVerifyPage.text: An email has been sent to you. Please, check your inbox and follow password recovery link in the email. The link will be valid for { tokenExpirationHours } hours

forgotPasswordSetPage.title: Set a password
forgotPasswordSetPage.subTitle: Your previous password has been reseted. Please set a new password for your account.

text.success: Password has been changed successfully and now you can login using it.
text.alreadyConsumed: The link has already been used for password reset. You should be able to login using your new password or reset it again to obtain another recovery link
text.linkInvalid: The link is invalid or broken. Please, check it for correctness. You may also try to reset password again.
text.linkExpired: The link has expired. Please, start password recovery process again to obtain a new one.

tabAccount.title: Account
tabAccount.emailVerifyNotification: A confirmation link has been sent to {email}. Please, check your inbox and follow the link to verify added email.
tabAccount.emailWasAutoverified: DEVELOPMENT ONLY: Provided email has been autoverified by the system and now you can login using it. You could also enable emailing in server config to use actual emails for verification

validations.email: Value is not a valid email address

validations.password: Password must have at least 8 characters, must contain uppercase and lowercase letters, at least one number and one special character

validations.emailIsUsed: Email address is already in use
validations.deletingLastEmail: The only email cannot be deleted, you won't be able to login!
validations.mustAgreeToPolicies: You must agree to Privacy Policies
validations.maximumNumberOfRecordsReached: Maximum allowed number of records reached

cookieBanner.title: Using cookies
cookieBanner.text: This website or its third-party tools use cookies so that we can display this website correctly. By closing this banner, scrolling this page, clicking a link or continuing to browse you allow us to use cookies and also agree to {privacyLink}
